Theory and Craft Applying the theory of computer science to the craft of software engineering.
Each episode we focus on one idea from computer science and try to understand how it fits into our world as professional programmers. Think of it as book club for coders. en-us Mon, 24 Aug 2015 01:30:00 +0000 Wed, 10 Mar 2021 20:25:07 +0000
